lines.text: This morning, two prisoners escaped from North Camp. Thirteen other prisoners, no doubt inspired by their idiotic example, also tried to escape. If any of you would like to cheer, go right ahead. There will be no more escape attempts in this camp. I'll repeat that. THERE WILL BE NO MORE ESCAPE ATTEMPTS IN THIS CAMP!!
Listen to me! Our day has come! Most of the SS are dead! It's everyone for himself now!
Those of you who survive, bear witness! Let the world know what has happened here! God is with you! Now let nothing stop you!
[escape begins]
You will be killed!
Did you know that tomorrow is the beginning of Sukkot?
Yes. 'Tis a Holy Day.
I forgot. And my father was a rabbi.
They kill on Holy Days. Why not the other way around? God will forgive.
There are those here who are wondering if we can forgive God.
I will do anything for revenge, even if I have to die for it.
How old are you?
How old do you have to be?
You are old enough.
Everyone calls me Sasha. It saves time and energy.
Look at the moon, Sasha.
Look at the board, Sasha
I just can't believe it. We're actually killing SS men. I mean, that's a hard thing to believe. Killing them. It's beautiful. I just can't believe it!
Please, what are you going to do?
What do you think? There are no babies in Sobibor.
Your going to kill her.
Because I'm in a good mood I'm going to let you live.
Give me my baby!
I don't understand, I'm giving you a chance to live, it's quite unusual.

[spits in Wagners face]
I spit on your offer you Nazi bastard!

[on hearing that Sobibor is a death camp and his parents and sister are dead]
You knew this, you knew and you didn't tell us.
My parents are dead to. The sergeants, they said I wasn't to tell anyone, they'd kill me.
Our mother and our father and our sister, are murdered. Now I want to kill. I *will* kill!
